title: Europe floods: Merkel shocked by 'surreal' devastation
content:
1. Europe floods: Merkel shocked by 'surreal' devastation  BBC News
  2. Flooding in Europe kills at least 150 with hundreds still missing | DW News  DW News
  3. Desperate search for survivors as western Europe reels from a 'catastrophe of historic proportion'  CNN
  4. Germany Floods: Merkel Visits Region as Toll Continues to Mount  The New York Times
  5. Merkel says Germany must do more to tackle climate change  Reuters
